place_to_go: Where do you want to go?
when_to_go: When do you want to go?
accept_agreement: I UNDERSTAND AND I WANT TO PROCEED
tos:
You are now going to be prompted to allow SnoozeHub to read and process your public ETH address.
If you don't want to share this information with us DON'T click on the button below
grpc_error_body: We are currently experiencing some issues connecting to our servers. Please try again in a second. If this error persists please log out and clear your cookies
ethereum_request_error_body: We are currently experiencing some issues processing ETH requests on the blockchain. Please try again in a second.
web3capable_browser_error_body: It doesn't look like your browser supports web3. Please use a web3 capable browser or install the Metamask extension on your current browser.
name: Name
file_type_size_error: File type/size not supported (max 512kb, PNG only, from {start} to {end} photos)
registration_error_body: We are unable to process your registration request at the moment. Please try again later.
no_beds_found_error_body: Looks like there are no beds available for the selected dates. Please try again with different dates.
email_confirmation_error_body: We are unable to process your email confirmation request at the moment. Please try again later.
delete_account_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
insert_mail_to_delete: Type {msg} below to delete your account
add_bed_error_body: We are unable to process your bed addition request at the moment. Please try again later.
delete_bed_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this bed? All bookings will be cancelled.
bed_deleting_error_body: We are unable to process your bed deletion request at the moment. Please try again later.
minimum_days_notice_error: Minimum days notice should be at least 1.
maximum_days_notice_error: Maximum days notice should be 30 or less.
notice_days_not_number: Notice days should be a valid number.
dates_disabled_message: Note: some dates are disabled as they already belong to a different availability.
booking_availability_adding_error_body: We are currently unable to process your request for adding booking availability.
booking_availability_deleting_error_body: We are currently unable to process your request for deleting booking availability.
no_bed: Uh oh, no bed found with the given ID: {id}
unknown_error_body: An unknown error occurred. Please try again later.
